dmca.title: [ABUSE] Unauthorized Use of Internet Meta Tags [ID:ZQ_p[Ei^]\`fj35:ID]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, December 21, 2005 4:33 PM
To: legalcic@guthy-renker.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Unauthorized Use of Internet Meta Tags
[ID:ZQ_p[Ei^]\`fj35:ID]]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Unauthorized Use of Internet Meta Tags
[ID:ZQ_p[Ei^]\`fj35:ID]
Date: Wed, 21 Dec 2005 16:17:30 -0500
From: legalcic@guthy-renker.com <legalcic@guthy-renker.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com <abuse@theplanet.com>

We have been sending the following letter to the site involved with no
response from them so far.  Can you help us resolve this issue with
them?  We simply need them to remove the GRC Trademark "Winsor Pilates"
from the source codes of their site.  Thank you and Happy
Holidays,  Legal GRC   VIA EMAIL Dear : AbuseIt has come to
my attention that your website, is using the words "Winsor Pilates" as a
meta-tag.  GRC is the owner of the trademark Winsor Pilates and has
registered this mark with the United States Patent and Trademark Office
(U.S. Registration
No. 2,712,016 Winsor Pilates) and elsewhere throughout the world. 
GRC does not permit the use of its trademarks or trade names, or variations
on those trademarks or trade names, as meta-tags in websites owned or
operated by others without Guthy-Renker's prior written permission.I am not
aware that you have a legitimate interest in our business purpose for your
use of the words "Winsor Pilates" as a meta-tag or that you have obtained
written consent by this company for same.  As you may know, meta-tags
are invisible to Internet users but they are readable by search engines and
are used to increase traffic to websites.  Therefore, your use of the
words "Winsor Pilates" as a meta-tag can be viewed is an improper and
unauthorized attempt to derive some commercial value from GRC's valuable
trademark.  GRC therefore considers your use of the words "Winsor
Pilates" as a meta-tag to be an infringement of Guthy-Renker Corporation's
valuable trademark rights.We ask that you immediately remove the words
"Winsor Pilates"
from the meta-tags in your website and refrain from using such as a meta-tag
in the future.  Please let me know within five (5) business days of the
date of this letter that you have made the requested modification to your
website http://www.discount-xenical-online.com/rpilbi.htm  
Thank you in advance for your cooperation. Guthy-Renker Corporation
 is the owner, or exclusive licensee, of the following trademarks,
among others:  Winsor Pilates, Proactiv Solution, Youthful Essence, Get
the Edge!, Core Secrets, Natural Advantage, Principal Secret, and Sheer
Cover.
 Sincerely, Stephanie BlackmanGeneral CounselGuthy-Renker
Corporation3340 Ocean Park Blvd.Santa Monica, CA 90405Fax: 
310-581-3443


- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
